00025 #ifndef __RenderTarget_H__
00026 #define __RenderTarget_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 #include "OgreString.h"
00031 #include "OgreViewport.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00046     class _OgreExport RenderTarget
00047     {
00048     public:
00049         enum StatFlags
00050         {
00051             SF_NONE            = 0,
00052             SF_FPS            = 1,
00053             SF_AVG_FPS        = 2,
00054             SF_BEST_FPS        = 4,
00055             SF_WORST_FPS    = 8,
00056             SF_TRIANGLE_COUNT = 16,
00057             SF_ALL            = 0xFFFF
00058         };
00059 
00060         RenderTarget();
00061         virtual ~RenderTarget();
00062 
00064         virtual String getName(void);
00065 
00067         virtual void getMetrics(int &width, int &height, int &colourDepth);
00068 
00069         virtual int getWidth(void);
00070         virtual int getHeight(void);
00071         virtual int getColourDepth(void);
00072 
00086         virtual void update(void);
00087 
00111         virtual Viewport* addViewport(Camera* cam, int ZOrder = 0, float left = 0, float top = 0 ,
00112             float width = 100, float height = 100);
00113 
00116         virtual void removeViewport(int ZOrder);
00117 
00120         virtual void removeAllViewports(void);
00121 
00132         virtual void setStatsDisplay(StatFlags sf);
00133 
00152         virtual void getStatistics(float& lastFPS, float& avgFPS,
00153             float& bestFPS, float& worstFPS);  // Access to stats
00154 
00157         virtual float getLastFPS();
00158 
00161         virtual float getAverageFPS();
00162 
00165         virtual float getBestFPS();
00166 
00169         virtual float getWorstFPS();
00170 
00173         virtual void resetStatistics(void);
00174 
00177         virtual void outputText(int x, int y, const String& text) = 0;
00178 
00188         virtual void getCustomAttribute(String name, void* pData);
00189 
00190     protected:
00192         String mName;
00193 
00194         int mWidth;
00195         int mHeight;
00196         int mColourDepth;
00197         bool mIsDepthBuffered;
00198 
00199         // Stats
00200         StatFlags mStatFlags;
00201         float mLastFPS;
00202         float mAvgFPS;
00203         float mBestFPS;
00204         float mWorstFPS;
00205         unsigned int mTris;
00206         void updateStats(void);
00207 
00208         typedef std::map<int, Viewport*, std::less<int> > ViewportList;
00210         ViewportList mViewportList;
00211     };
